StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_DBAUpdateEASECC]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body: @ssn varchar(9), @eas date.me, @ecc date.me AS update marine set update_Date=getdate(), user_login=user_name(), expira.on_of_current_contract=@ecc, expira.on_of_ac.ve_service=@eas where marine_id=(select person_id from person where social_security_number=@ssn)
